scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:sandbox
scripts.preflight: npm run format --workspaces --if-present && npm run lint && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
scripts.auth: npm run auth:npm && npm run auth:docker
scripts.prerelease:dev: npm run prerelease:version --workspaces && npm run prerelease:deps --workspaces
scripts.bundle: npm run generate && node_modules/.bin/esbuild packages/cli/index.ts --bundle --outfile=bundle/gemini.js --platform=node --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url); globalThis.__filename = require('url').fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); globalThis.__dirname = require('path').dirname(globalThis.__filename);" && bash scripts/copy_bundle_assets.sh
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:server && npm run build:cli
scripts.tag:docker: docker tag gemini-cli-sandbox ${SANDBOX_IMAGE_REGISTRY:?SANDBOX_IMAGE_REGISTRY not set}/${SANDBOX_IMAGE_NAME:?SANDBOX_IMAGE_NAME not set}:$npm_package_version
scripts.publish:release: npm run build:packages && npm run build:docker && npm run tag:docker && npm run prepare:cli-packagejson && npm run publish:sandbox && npm run publish:npm
